strapiPost.title: Naturals 2023 Season Schedule Announced
strapiPost.content:
The Northwest Arkansas Naturals 2023 Schedule has been announced! 

  • Play ball: The seasonâ€™s game slate is 138 games and will begin with Opening Night at Arvest Ballpark on Thursday, April 6. The Naturals will host the Midland RockHounds in a three-game series through Saturday, April 8. 
  • Ballpark: There will be 24 home games on Fridays and Saturdays and a home game on July 4, which means a perfect excuse for fireworks at the stadium! The 2023 schedule has 69 total home games and 69 road games over a six-month period. Game times will be finalized and announced at a later date. 

For more information, click HERE.
